title: With NBA season approaching, Anfernee Simons is ready for new role
author: Aidan Buchanan
bullets: Boston Celtics "I want to contribute to winning at the highest level.
And so whatever, how that looks, I'm fine with.
" Anfernee Simons at the Celtics Media Day (Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff).

title: ‘Believers’ co-directors Gotham Chopra and Lauren Fisher discuss new ESPN Red Sox series
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Boston Red Sox Chopra and Fisher sat down with Boston.
com for a wide-ranging interview about the three-part documentary.
The Red Sox celebrate a long awaited win.

title: Fall in New England has never looked this good
author: Boston.com Staff
bullets: Scenic Six Get five days of New England travel tips with Fall Field Guide.
If you ask us, New England is at its best in the fall.

From vibrant foliage and scenic drives to cozy weekend getaways, apple orchards, and the region’s best cider doughnuts, the fall is nothing short of magical — and we’re here to help you experience it all.

title: Red Sox’s late-inning rally was sparked by a group of unsung heroes
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Red Sox "Scrappy, man.
We have different ways to win as an offense.
" Masataka Yoshida put Boston ahead in the seventh inning.

title: In his first playoff start, Garrett Crochet pitched a masterpiece for Red Sox in Yankee Stadium
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Red Sox "Just a performance that big-time pitchers make.
And that's who he is.
” Garrett Crochet finished his outing on Tuesday with 117 pitches.

title: 5 new restaurants we’re excited to try in October
author: Jillian Dara
bullets: Restaurants Where to eat next: 5 new restaurants opening in Beacon Hill, the Wharf District, Seaport, and Jamaica Plain this October.

title: Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Oct. 1)
author: The Boston Globe
bullets: Real Estate News ShareSend this article to your social connections.
ABINGTON 413 Linwood St.
One-family raised ranch, built in 1970, 1,873 square feet, 7 rooms, 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, on 22,197-square-foot lot.

title: DA: Malden man arrested, two others charged in connection to fatal Dedham shooting
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Crime James Brown, 23, is scheduled to be arraigned Oct.
1 on charges including murder and carrying a firearm without a license.
Three people are now facing charges, including one man charged with murder, in connection with a fatal June shooting in the parking lot of a Dedham BJ’s, prosecutors announced Tuesday.

title: Services planned for Haverhill police officer, 32, who died ‘unexpectedly’
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News Katelyn Tully, a decorated army veteran who served in Afghanistan for six months, will be buried with military honors.
The funeral for a Haverhill police officer who died “unexpectedly” Sept.
26 will be held Friday, according to her obituary.
